name: #12 Anva Stormwind
description:
Anva Stormwind

Race: Human

Subraces and Variants:
Ethnicity: Nar

Physical Characteristics:
Age: 31 years
Height: 5'5"
Weight: 138 lbs.
Eyes: Hazel
Skin: Light Brown

Gender: Female
Class: Bard
Bard College: College of Lore
Background: Sailor
Occupation: Politician or bureaucrat

Trait: I like a job well done, especially if I can convince someone else to do it.
Ideal: Fairness. We all do the work, so we all share in the rewards. (Lawful)
Bond: In a harbor town, I have a paramour whose eyes nearly stole me from the sea.
Flaw: My pride will probably lead to my destruction.

Description:
Appearance: Braided beard or hair
High Ability: Charisma-persuasive, forceful, born leader
Low Ability: Intelligence-dim-witted, slow
Talent: Great with children
Mannerism: Squints
Interaction Trait: Suspicious
Values: Tradition (Lawful), Protective of a sentimental keepsake
Flaw or Secret: Has a powerful enemy
